Controls.Label4.Text: The following components are used to increase the functionality of the program, all rights go to their owners.
Controls.LinkLabel3.Text: Image to palette mechanism by ColorThief; KSemenenko
Controls.LinkLabel4.Text: Animation for controls by Pavel Torgashov
Controls.LinkLabel5.Text: Modifying Modern Windows Elements inspired by u/aveyo and u/Egg-Tricky on Reddit
Controls.LinkLabel6.Text:
The following items are by Microsoft:
• Classic colours schemes
• Luna theme preview (Luna.msstyles)
• Command Prompt and PowerShell raster fonts previews
Controls.LinkLabel7.Text: Bitmaps to cursors conversion mechanism by Evan Olds
Controls.LinkLabel8.Text: JetBrainsMono font for nerd colour info
Controls.LinkLabel9.Text: Handling JSON files by Newtonsoft JSON; James Newton-King
Controls.LinkLabel11.Text: Getting elements of visual styles file (*.msstyles) by Advanced UxTheme wrapper
Controls.LinkLabel13.Text: Changing image HSL filter by Miran Uhan (Used in Wallpaper Tone Changer)

Controls.Label5.Text:
• Windows 11 preview is redesigned to make it closer to the latest stable builds.

• Description labels are re-written, they are dependent on the latest stable Windows 11. If your Windows is outdated, these labels might not be the same as your current system.

• If you installed ExplorerPatcher and uninstalled it, WinPaletter will detect ExplorerPatcher is still installed (due do ExplorerPatcher registry remnants) and so the descriptions will be different. You can solve this by going to Settings > ExplorerPatcher and then disable preview synchronisation.
Controls.Label21.Text:
• Now you can modify cursors shadow. You can control its colour, blur power, opacity and its offset (X, Y).

• Each cursor has its own separate shadow.

• Shadow in "Miscellaneous" part is rendered by Windows, while custom shadow is rendered by WinPaletter itself.

• The more you enable custom shadow, the more WinPaletter will take to render the cursor.
Controls.Label10.Text:
• Fixing classic cursor main arrow to make it matches the classic NT cursor outline.

• Improvements in Windows 7/Vista preview speed while customising titlebar height in metrics. (There was a lag)

• Fixing crashing bug during applying a classic colour with classic theme enabled or applying classic colours with switching from a theme to classic mode in Windows XP, Vista && 7

• Making a visual-styles change in Windows XP being applied to login screen too.

• Fixing bug in reading "Fonts Substitutes" from theme file.

• Fixing bug in reading and saving "Fonts" from\to theme file.

• Mechanism of detecting internet connection becomes quicker than before.

• UI improvements.

Controls.Label1.Text:
It can be .msstyles or .theme file
.theme file will be used to use the associated .msstyles file in it
